scripts.dev: NEXT_RUNTIME=classic NEXT_DISABLE_SWC=1 NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 node --no-wasm-code-gc node_modules/next/dist/bin/next dev --hostname 0.0.0.0 --port 3000
scripts.build: NEXT_RUNTIME=classic NEXT_DISABLE_SWC=1 NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 node --no-wasm-code-gc node_modules/next/dist/bin/next build
scripts.start: NEXT_RUNTIME=classic NEXT_DISABLE_SWC=1 NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 node --no-wasm-code-gc node_modules/next/dist/bin/next start -p 10000
